sorry sexduarf it is one of mine !! theres a problem with it ... and here's the fix .........

what you need to do is open the cue file in notepad ... It'll look like this -- 
FILE "Into The Wild(2007) DVDrip KvCD GingaNinja (TUS Release).bin" BINARY
TRACK 01 MODE2/2352
INDEX 01 00:00:00
TRACK 02 MODE2/2352
INDEX 00 00:04:00
INDEX 01 00:06:00 

so you want to add the word FLAiTE after (2007) so it looks like this ---

FILE "Into The Wild(2007) FLAiTE DVDrip KvCD GingaNinja (TUS Release).bin" BINARY
TRACK 01 MODE2/2352
INDEX 01 00:00:00
TRACK 02 MODE2/2352
INDEX 00 00:04:00
INDEX 01 00:06:00

now save and there you have it !!! it should burn with NERO !!!

I'm sorry about this problem !!!! really don't know how it happened !!!
